summary: This bill, H.R. 704, proposes the issuance of a "Manatee Semipostal Stamp" by the United States Postal Service. The proceeds from the sale of this stamp will be transferred to the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, specifically for the conservation of manatees and their habitat within the United States.  The stamp will be available for a minimum of two years and is subject to the regulations outlined in Title 39, Section 416 of the United States Code.
